sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_2227a5351372d200d0143d622244b0ae
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_snc_alexa_skill.EchoResponseBuilder</api_name><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>EchoResponseBuilder</name><script><![CDATA[var EchoResponseBuilder = Class.create();
EchoResponseBuilder.prototype = {
	initialize: function() {
		this.response = {};
		this.response.response = {};
		
	},
	
	setAttributes: function(attrObj) {
		this.response.sessionAttributes = attrObj;
		return;
	},
	
	setOutputSpeech: function(type, text, ssml){
		var o = {};
		o.type = type;
		o.text = text;
		o.ssml = ssml;
		
		this.response.response.outputSpeech = o;
		return;
		
	},
	
	setCard: function(type, title, content, text, imageObj){
		var c = {};
		c.type = type;
		c.text = text;
		c.content = content;
		//c.image = {};
		//c.image.smallImageUrl = imageObj.small;
		//c.image.largeImageUrl = imageObj.large;
		
		this.response.response.card = c;
		return;
		
	},
	
	setReprompt: function(type, text, ssml){
		var r = {};
		r.outputSpeech = {};
		r.outputSpeech.ssml = ssml;
		r.outputSpeech.type = type;
		r.outputSpeech.text = text;
		
		this.response.response.reprompt = r;
		return;
	},
	
	setEnd: function(endSession){
		this.response.response.shouldEndSession = endSession;
	},
	
	getResponse: function() {
		this.response.version = '1;0';
		
		var r = this.response;
		var j = new global.JSON();
		var str = j.encode(r);
		gs.info('*** AVS response = ' + str);
		return this.response;
	},
	
	type: 'EchoResponseBuilder'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>jc</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2016-04-16 00:36:38</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>2227a5351372d200d0143d622244b0ae</sys_id><sys_mod_count>20</sys_mod_count><sys_name>EchoResponseBuilder</sys_name><sys_package display_value="ALEXA-SKILL-DEV" source="x_snc_alexa_skill">101eb7da13a21200d0143d622244b063</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="ALEXA-SKILL-DEV">101eb7da13a21200d0143d622244b063</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_2227a5351372d200d0143d622244b0ae</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2016-08-29 19:05:19</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

	try {
		var req = request.body.data.request;
		var ses = request.body.data.session;
		gs.info('Echo request = ' + global.JSON.stringify(request.body.data));
		var ER = new EchoRequest(ses, req);
		ER.process();
		gs.info('Echo request processed');
		response.setStatus(200);
		response.setContentType("application/json;charset=UTF-8");
		var writer = response.getStreamWriter();
		writer.writeString(global.JSON.stringify(ER.response));							
	}catch(ex) {
		gs.info('ERROR OCCURED::: ' + ex);
	}
	return;
	
})(request, response);
]]></operation_script><operation_uri>/api/x_snc_alexa_skill/process_skill</operation_uri><produces>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</produces><produces_customized>false</produces_customized><relative_path>/</relative_path><request_example/><requires_acl_authorization>false</requires_acl_authorization><requires_authentication>true</requires_authentication><short_description/><sys_class_name>sys_ws_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2016-09-22 10:16:08</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>44312a05db4ee2004c93743dbf961903</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>post</sys_name><sys_package display_value="ALEXA-SKILL-DEV" source="x_snc_alexa_skill">101eb7da13a21200d0143d622244b063</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="ALEXA-SKILL-DEV">101eb7da13a21200d0143d622244b063</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ws_operation_44312a05db4ee2004c93743dbf961903</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2016-09-22 10:16:08</sys_updated_on><web_service_definition display_value="ALEXA-SKILL-API">18d02605db4ee2004c93743dbf96196e</web_service_definition><web_service_version/></sys_ws_operation></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_b90604bd13fe9200d0143d622244b067
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_snc_alexa_skill.EchoRequest</api_name><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>EchoRequest</name><script><![CDATA[var EchoRequest = Class.create();
EchoRequest.prototype = {
	request: {},
	session: {},
	REQUEST_TYPE: '',
	intent_slots: {},
	session_attributes: {},
	
	response: '',
	
	initialize: function(session, request) {
		this.request = request;
		this.session = session;
		this.REQUEST_TYPE = request.type;
	},
	
	process: function() {
		var ir = this.getIntentRecord();
		if (!ir){
			return;
		}
		gs.info('*** AVS request = ' + global.JSON.stringify(this.request));
		this.handleIntent(ir);
		
	},
	
	getIntentRecord: function() {
		//If launch request, get the Open record, or else find the intent record
		var keyword = '';
		if (this.REQUEST_TYPE == 'LaunchRequest'){
			keyword = 'LaunchRequest';
		} else {
			keyword = this.request.intent.name;
			this.intent_slots = this.request.intent.slots;
			
			if (this.session.attributes) {
				this.session_attributes = this.session.attributes;
			}
		}
		
		var ir = new GlideRecord('x_snc_alexa_skill_utterance');
		if (ir.get('keyword', keyword)){
			return ir;
		} else {
			this.setResponse("Something went wrong. Could not find matching intent record in Intents table");
		}
		
		return;
	},
	
	handleIntent: function(intent){
		gs.info('*** AVS handleIntent : ' + intent);
		
		var evaluator = new GlideScopedEvaluator();
		evaluator.putVariable('content', this.intent_slots);
		//evaluator.putVariable('attributes', this.session_attributes);
		evaluator.putVariable('result', null);
		gs.info('***** AVS handleIntent --> ' + intent.name);
		var alexaUtils = new global.AlexaUtils();
		if(alexaUtils.processSessionData(this.session_attributes,intent.keyword)){
			this.session_attributes = {};
		}
		evaluator.putVariable('attributes', this.session_attributes);
		var isIntegrationUser = !(!this.intent_slots.SecretCode.value);
		var secretCode = isIntegrationUser?this.intent_slots.SecretCode.value:'';
		//var isIntegrationUser = true;
		//var secretCode = '379411';
		var validAccessToken = alexaUtils.getDecryptedToken(this.session.user.accessToken);
		gs.info('after token captured');
		var instanceName = alexaUtils.getInstanceName(this.session.user.accessToken);
		var userName = alexaUtils.getUserName(this.session.user.accessToken);
		evaluator.putVariable('instanceName',instanceName);
		evaluator.putVariable('isIntegrationUser',isIntegrationUser);
		evaluator.putVariable('caller_info', alexaUtils.getCallerInfo(isIntegrationUser, validAccessToken, instanceName, userName, secretCode));
		evaluator.putVariable('token',validAccessToken);
		gs.info('In handleIntent - token = ' + validAccessToken);
		evaluator.evaluateScript(intent, 'script', null);
		var result = evaluator.getVariable('result');
		gs.info('*** AVS handleIntent : result = ' + result);
		this.setResponse(result);
	},
	
	setResponse: function(response) {
		this.response = response;
		return;
	},
	
	type: 'EchoRequest'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>jc</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2016-04-15 17:29:03</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>b90604bd13fe9200d0143d622244b067</sys_id><sys_mod_count>88</sys_mod_count><sys_name>EchoRequest</sys_name><sys_package display_value="ALEXA-SKILL-DEV" source="x_snc_alexa_skill">101eb7da13a21200d0143d622244b063</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="ALEXA-SKILL-DEV">101eb7da13a21200d0143d622244b063</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_b90604bd13fe9200d0143d622244b067</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>chaitanya.s</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2016-09-21 08:36:24</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ws_operation_507a897d1332d200d0143d622244b028
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ws_operation"><sys_ws_operation action="DELETE"><active>true</active><consumes>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</consumes><consumes_customized>false</consumes_customized><default_operation_uri/><enforce_acl/><http_method>POST</http_method><name>post</name><operation_script><![CDATA[(function process(/*RESTAPIRequest*/ request, /*RESTAPIResponse*/ response) {
	try {
		var skillAppId = request.pathParams.skillAppId;	
		if(skillAppId) {			
			//call the respective custom skill's endpoint.
			
		}else {
			var req = request.body.data.request;
			var ses = request.body.data.session;
			gs.info('Echo request = ' + global.JSON.stringify(request.body.data));
			var ER = new EchoRequest(ses, req);
			ER.process();
			gs.info('Echo request processed');
			response.setStatus(200);
			response.setContentType("application/json;charset=UTF-8");
			var writer = response.getStreamWriter();
			writer.writeString(global.JSON.stringify(ER.response));			
		}		
	}catch(ex) {
		gs.info('ERROR OCCURED::: ' + ex);
	}
	return;
	
})(request, response);
]]></operation_script><operation_uri>/api/x_snc_alexa_skill/process/{skillAppId}</operation_uri><produces>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</produces><produces_customized>false</produces_customized><relative_path>/{skillAppId}</relative_path><request_example/><requires_acl_authorization>false</requires_acl_authorization><requires_authentication>false</requires_authentication><short_description/><sys_class_name>sys_ws_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>jc</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2016-04-15 22:28:16</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>507a897d1332d200d0143d622244b028</sys_id><sys_mod_count>90</sys_mod_count><sys_name>post</sys_name><sys_package display_value="ALEXA-SKILL-DEV" source="x_snc_alexa_skill">101eb7da13a21200d0143d622244b063</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="ALEXA-SKILL-DEV">101eb7da13a21200d0143d622244b063</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ws_operation_507a897d1332d200d0143d622244b028</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>chaitanya.s</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2016-09-22 07:31:49</sys_updated_on><web_service_definition display_value="Amazon Alexa API">ff4d694d13b69200d0143d622244b019</web_service_definition><web_service_version/></sys_ws_operation></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_metadata_link_8f45f25413271e0079edd8e32244b098
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_metadata_link"><sys_metadata_link action="DELETE"><directory>update</directory><documentkey>0679b69713f61600d0143d622244b09a</documentkey><payload><?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<record_update table="x_snc_alexa_skill_utterance">
    <x_snc_alexa_skill_utterance action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <active>true</active>
        <keyword>CheckStatusInc</keyword>
        <name>CheckStatus Step 2</name>
        <next/>
        <script><![CDATA[(function(content, attributes, erb){
	var num = "INC" + content.Number.value;
	
	var inc = new GlideRecord('incident');
	if (inc.get('number', num)){
		var updatedArr = inc.sys_updated_on.getDisplayValue().split(" ");
		var updatedDate = updatedArr[0];
		var updatedTime = updatedArr[1].split(":");
		updatedTime = updatedTime[0] + ":" + updatedTime[1];
		
		var notes = inc.comments.getJournalEntry(-1);
		var na = notes.split("\n\n");
		notes = na[0];
		
		//Message output...
		msg = "<speak>";
		msg += "The current status of your incident is: " + inc.state.getDisplayValue() + ". ";
		msg += "Your incident was last updated on: " + updatedDate + " at " + updatedTime  + ". ";
		
		if (notes != "" && notes != null) {
			notes = notes.split("\n");
			msg += "The last update was: " + notes[1] + ".";
		}
		
		msg += "</speak>";
		erb.setOutputSpeech("SSML", "", msg);
		//End message output
	} else {
		erb.setReprompt("PlainText", "I was unable to find that Incident. What was that Incident number again?");
	}
	erb.setEnd(true);
	
	result = erb.getResponse();
	
	
	
})(content, attributes, new EchoResponseBuilder());]]></script>
        <sys_created_by>jc</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2016-04-20 22:35:31</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>0679b69713f61600d0143d622244b09a</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>30</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_updated_by>jc</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2016-04-21 17:32:07</sys_updated_on>
    </x_snc_alexa_skill_utterance>
</record_update>
